instruction: Explain how two items are related.
output: Storytelling and motivation are connected through their shared ability to evoke emotion in the listener. Through the use of storytelling, a speaker can connect with their audience on an emotional level and motivate them to take action. By combining vivid examples and powerful narratives, speakers can Help create a sense of purpose and drive in their listeners. This, in turn, can make it easier for listeners to take action and stay motivated.
